description:
This is the  essential information management tool for your WebOS device to manage all your day to day information. 

Perfect for managing,  Birthdays, Anniversaries, Bills, Credit Card numbers, To Do Items, Library Books, CDs, DVDs, Games, Cheat Codes etc.  
Keep track of your Weight, Mileage, Calories, Grades, Weight Training, Blood Pressure, or just about anything you need to remember or store. 

MyLists lets you create your own lists. Sort the lists, create and edit fields.

MyLists comes installed with several sample lists that will get you started right away. Once you are familiar with MyLists you will be creating your own lists in no time. There is no limit to the number of lists you can create. 

MyLists is very powerful, but is designed to be simple and easy to use.

MyLists is your one stop tool for all your list and personal data management needs.
Check out our help page for data migration tools.

Export and Import Lists using Google Spreadsheets

You can share data between your Phone and your Touchpad through the import/export feature
versionNote:
A 24 hour time format, use this to record duration for things like your joggins stats, swim times etc.

We've verified it runs on the Touchpad, but it will not use the entire screen.
